body.title: Built-in advertisement chanel
body.description: When kiosk inactive it turns into digital signature screen. Images gallery uploaded through Admin Panel appearing on screen one after another in smooth sliding animation. There is no limit in number of images all of them will be displayed one after another. Additional plugins available like display RSS feeds or instant messages on screen. As well easy to change animation or size of images. All this plugins can be installed through Admin Panel without accessing kiosks itselfâ€™
